attributes.action: Change the laws for fireworks only to use silent fireworks.
attributes.additional_details: There are pets, wildlife and people that are impacted by noise all the time due to fireworks. We don't need it. Let's light up the sky silently not with bangs
attributes.background: Why do we need noises and banging. Ban the noise

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758

While some fireworks are marketed as silent, these still make some noise. If you would like the Government to reduce the decibel limit to a specific level, you could start a new petition requesting this.
